title: Outcomes
description: Combined outcomes dataset including follow up, deaths, recurrence and treatment variables.

fupca_start_shifted.name: fupca_start_shifted
fupca_start_shifted.description: Shifted date at start of follow-up for cohort analyses.
fupca_start_shifted.x-description: Date based on date of receipt of baseline questionnaire.

fupca_end_shifted.name: fupca_end_shifted
fupca_end_shifted.description: Shifted date at end of follow-up.
fupca_end_shifted.x-description: In this version of the follow-up, the flagging is considered comprehensive for majority of cohort to 01-Jan-2023 (i.e. about a year before we received the flagging data because the flagging data in recent years is not complete).  Therefore majority of cohort are considered followed to 01-Jan-2023.  The others have end follow-up at death, embarkation, of questionnaire completion.

fupca_end_reason.name: fupca_end_reason
fupca_end_reason.x-description: End of follow-up reason is either death of exit from the NHS (an embarkation), or completion of appropriate follow-up questionnaire (with end date based on date questionnaire was due back), or being covered by 'flagging' to 01-Jan-2023.  The order in which these are assigned is important, else follow-up is biased; the SAS code handles this.
enumDescriptions: 10: Full follow-up by questionnaire to due date
20: Full follow-up by flagging to due date (questionnaire not received)
21: Partial follow-up by flagging to flag date (questionnaire not received)
22: Full follow-up by flagging to death date (prior to due date)
23: Full follow-up by flagging to exit date (prior to due date)
30: Reduced follow-up to earlier questionnaire (no later flagging)

vital_status.name: vital_status
vital_status.description: Ever known to be deceased based on information available at processing date.

Confirmed_death.name: Confirmed_death
enumDescriptions: 0: Death reported by relative, not yet confirmed in flagging

UCCode.name: UCCode
UCCode.description: Underlying cause of death ICD-10 code.

Reported_Cause_gs.name: Reported_Cause_gs
Reported_Cause_gs.description: Reported cause of death when death is not from flagging.

date_received_death_shifted.name: date_received_death_shifted
date_received_death_shifted.description: Shifted received date of death notification.

BC_death_confirmed.name: BC_death_confirmed
enumDescriptions: 0: Death from other causes or reported by relative
1: Breast cancer death confirmed in flagging (ICD 10 C50)
BC_death_confirmed.x-description: UCCode = ICD10 C50 from confirmed deaths only.

tumour_id.name: tumour_id
tumour_id.description: Tumour identifier. Recurrence and treatment variables are related to this tumour ID.

recurrence_flag.name: recurrence_flag
recurrence_flag.description: Breast Cancer Recurrence (local or distant) flag for particpants with first primary breast cancer (invasive and insitu).
enumDescriptions: 1: Participant had distant or local recurrence of first primary breast cancer
recurrence_flag.x-description: Derived from routine collected health datasets using procedure from Kilburn et al 2025 doi: 10.1186/s13063-025-09085-1.

date_firstrec_shifted.name: date_firstrec_shifted
date_firstrec_shifted.description: Shifted date of first breast cancer recurrence (local or distant).

rec_both_flg.name: rec_both_flg
rec_both_flg.description: Participant had both distant and local breast cancer recurrence flag.
enumDescriptions: 1: Participant had both distant and local recurrence

firstrec_type.name: firstrec_type
firstrec_type.description: Type of first breast cancer recurrence (local/distant).
enumDescriptions: Distant: First recurrence was distant recurrence
Local: First recurrence was local recurrence
firstrec_type.x-description: Distant recurrence was identified predominately by direct indicators of metastases (e.g. ICD10 codes C77X-79X). Local recurrence was identified via relevant surgeries' OPCS4 codes. See Kilburn et al 2025 for details.

firstrec_local_flg.name: firstrec_local_flg
firstrec_local_flg.description: First breast cancer recurrence was local local recurrence.
enumDescriptions: 1: Flag for First recurrence was local recurrence
firstrec_local_flg.x-description: Note local recurrence is reported to have lower sensitivity. See Kilburn et al 2025 for details.

date_locrec_shifted.name: date_locrec_shifted
date_locrec_shifted.description: Shifted date of local breast cancer recurrence.

firstrec_dist_flg.name: firstrec_dist_flg
firstrec_dist_flg.description: First breast cancer recurrence was distant recurrence flag].
enumDescriptions: 1: Flag for First recurrence was distant recurrence
firstrec_dist_flg.x-description: See Kilburn et al 2025 for details.

date_distrec_shifted.name: date_distrec_shifted
date_distrec_shifted.description: Shifted date of distant breast cancer recurrence.

distrec_source.name: distrec_source
distrec_source.description: Source of distant breast cancer recurrence.
distrec_source.x-description: See Kilburn et al 2025 for details.

dg_to_firstrec.name: dg_to_firstrec
dg_to_firstrec.description: Time from diagnosis to first breast cancer recurrence

firstrec_5y_flag.name: firstrec_5y_flag
firstrec_5y_flag.description: Breast cancer recurrence was within 5 years of diagnosis flag.
enumDescriptions: 0: First recurrence was at least 5 years after diagnosis
1: First recurrence withing the first 5 years after diagnosis

brca_surgery_date_shifted.name: brca_surgery_date_shifted
brca_surgery_date_shifted.description: Shifted date of first surgery for breast cancer.

brca_surgery_year.name: brca_surgery_year
brca_surgery_year.description: Year of first breast cancer surgery (real year).

brca_radiotherapy.name: brca_radiotherapy
brca_radiotherapy.description: Ever had radiotherapy for breast cancer.

brca_RT_start_shifted.name: brca_RT_start_shifted
brca_RT_start_shifted.description: Shifted date of first radiotherapy treatment for breast cancer.

brca_RT_year.name: brca_RT_year
brca_RT_year.description: Year of radiotherapy for breast cancer (real year).

brca_chemo.name: brca_chemo
brca_chemo.description: Ever had chemotherapy for breast cancer.

brca_chemo_start_shifted.name: brca_chemo_start_shifted
brca_chemo_start_shifted.description: Shifted date of first chemotherapy treatment for breast cancer.

brca_chemo_start_year.name: brca_chemo_start_year
brca_chemo_start_year.description: Year of chemotherapy for breast cancer (real year).

brca_hormonetherapy.name: brca_hormonetherapy
brca_hormonetherapy.description: Ever had hormone therapy for breast cancer.

brca_neoadju_chemo.name: brca_neoadju_chemo
brca_neoadju_chemo.description: Ever had neoadjuvant chemotherapy for breast cancer.
